effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} by three [stages]{mechanic:stage}.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} by three [stages]{mechanic:stage} in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
特攻を　かなり　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It drastically raises the Sp. Atk stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta moltissimo l’Attacco Speciale di un
Pokémon in una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il
Pokémon è sostituito.

Ataque con los puños. Puede bajar la Defensa del
objetivo. Puede romper rocas fuera del combate.

Hebt den Spezial-Angriffs-Wert eines Pokémon
im Kampf stark an. Die Wirkung endet mit dem
Austausch des Pokémon.

Augmente sensiblement l’Attaque Spéciale
pendant un combat. L’effet s’estompe si
le Pokémon se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 특수공격을
상당히 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
とくこうを　かなり　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It drastically raises the Sp. Atk stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

It drastically raises the Sp. Atk stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte sensiblement l’Atq. Spé. pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe
si le Pokémon se retire.
